net.zebra.ls.hmm

Interface HMM

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FactoryImpl.HMMWrapper

    public interface HMM
    The main interface of hidden Markov model, which aims to separate design and implementation. There are only three core public interfaces: HMM, Obs, and Factory. The public class FactoryImpl that creates the default implementation of this interface can be replaced by advanced class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
